siteMetadata.defaultDescription: Hi, I'm Gaurav Raj, a Cyber Security Student with a passion for Reverse Engineering, Binary Exploitation, Bug Bounty hunting, penetration testing, and programming in multiple languages. I'm dedicated to learning and growing my cybersecurity skills to enhance my ability to identify vulnerabilities in software, applications, and websites. While I may not be an expert, I'm confident that my current level of experience can be a valuable asset to any team looking to improve their security defenses.
